name: Flock Party
description:
Ready to squawk and roll? In Flock Party, you take control of a bird by using the movement of your arms and head to flap, turn, glide, and dive. The intuitive flight mechanics are easy to learn, but challenging to master. You’ll need to keep flapping your arms to maintain altitude, while tilting and turning to avoid obstacles.

Whether you’re a seasoned VR gamer or a first-time flier, Flock Party is designed to be comfortable and fun for anyone to pick up and enjoy.

Features:

  • Unique flying mechanic controlled by your hands and head
  • Comfortable and exciting immersive flying experience
  • Single-player adventure mode featuring cutscenes and a storyline
  • Multiplayer mode with customizable match options and multiple different gameplay modes
  • 18 different colorful courses across six different biomes (with more to come!)
  • An infinite “Fly Forever” mode that procedurally generates a course to test your skills and endurance
  • Customize the visual look of your bird



Help guide your bird back to its wayward flock in Flock Party’s single-player campaign. The campaign features 18 courses that weave through grassy meadows, steep canyons, menacing castles, towering mountains, dense jungles, and more. The environments become increasingly challenging to navigate as you progress through the courses, requiring you to use all your skills to make it to the finish line.





Why fly alone when you can fly with friends? Host private games or join a public match to compete against other birds to see who’s the best flier in races of up to eight players. Matches can be customized to create the racing experience you want. In addition to traditional racing, you can face off against other players in a variety of different multiplayer modes, including “Egg Hunt” and “Last Bird Flying,” for endless bird-filled fun.





Make your bird stand out with a range of customization options. You can change the shape of its body, eyes, wings, beak, and feet, choose different feather patterns and color options, and add accessories like hats and glasses – the sky’s the limit!
